metadata.name: Astheon Insignia
metadata.description:
From the grand architect of the cosmos, Eldorai Efficio, comes the Astheon's Insignia, a symbol of honor, respect, and enduring legacy. 

This is not merely an NFT, but a testament to your invaluable contribution to the creation of Astelos Illuminara, the first city of Animus Regnum. 

As an Astheon, your essence will forever be interwoven with the city you help birth, your legacy echoing in its gleaming towers and bustling streets.

The Astheon's Insignia offers:

   ~Elysian Citizenship: Citizenship in the Galaxy Elysium, Star System Hoshidori, Planet Seraphel, and Nation 
      Illuminara.

   ~Luminarai Character Creation: The ability to create a Luminarai character, a unique privilege within the 
      game.

   ~Equity Share: A share of the equity from the 15% in our real estate, gold, and silver revenues.

   ~Real Estate Ownership: Ownership of a luxury condo in the largest condominium in Astelos Illuminara.

   ~Special Status: The title of Astheon, granting special privileges within the game.

Once claimed in-game, the NFT becomes a soul-bound token, ensuring the benefits and privileges of being an Astheon remain exclusive to you, the original holder. 

Join us in shaping the future of Animus Regnum.
